text: Þis sindon þa land gemaru into hwathamstede.
Fram mærforde to þare headic fram þære headic æfter dene into deorleage.
Fram deorleage to langhecge þæt hit cimð to lippelane.
Fram lippelane to secgham, fram secgham to pollenæstoce.
Fram pollenæstoce to herpedene fram herpedene to þam æsce to þæt forde.
Fram þam æsce to plumstigele, fram plumstigele to þam hole beame.
Fram hole beame to gilmere, fram gilmere to þæs ealdermannes mere.
Fram þæs eldermannes mere into merdene swa into marforde.
